description: Inquiries responding to the RFI are requested to provide feedback on UNSPC 56101700 ( Office furniture). In particular, they are requested to share samples, recommend business phrases used by French offices. Responses will not committed to funding therefore responses are optional. Service times should be 8-5pm
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Office Furniture for Québec, QC**
================================================================

**Reference Number: cb-716-84002020**
----------------------------------------

**Title:**
Office Furniture for Québec, QC

**Solicitation Details:**

* **Solicitation Number:** 2024-00460
* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-07
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-24T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Supply Arrangement:**

* This tender is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C.
* Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid.

**Contracting Entity:**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* **Address:** 59 Camelot Dr., Nepean, ON, K2G 5W6
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Catherine Clairoux
	+ Telephone: (343) 596-9265
	+ Email: catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca

**Tender Description:**

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture in Québec, QC. The tender is based on a requirement from the Product Category 2: Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products of the SA.

**Notice and Instructions:**

For further details, please refer to the bid solicitation documents available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24213/2024-00460-request-for-bid-%28rfb.pdf. Only pre-qualified suppliers with a valid supply arrangement are eligible to bid. Reminders and reminders only and shall not affect the entitlement of firms to submit a bid.

Please ensure that your bid is submitted in accordance with the tendering process outlined in the bid solicitation documents. Bids received after the closing date and time will be rejected. As the tender is Expiré, it is now closed to bidders.

To find out more about the tender process, you may contact: [Contact
